title: Unban appeal
body:
So my first main account was called IproStrafer (this logged in account) and since i was new to the game i was a littile over toxoc which got me for a perm ban.
I have many other smurfs to play on and have fun on them but i would love to play on the main account that i have started on playing.
It’s been over 10 months ban and i am reformed and reaches gold 3 actually and I don’t use chat to flame others, so please riot get this account unbanned and make me happy I'm a loyal player and i got 3 people who are addicted to the game now on my hand, anyways regards from a lover of this game,
Iprostrafer.

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Spooky when long dead threads come back from the grave!

While the art of thread necromancy can be useful in some cases, this unfortunately, is not one of those times. I am putting this poor zombie back gently into that good night. 

RIP thread.

Riot doesn't unban accounts
They ain't going to make an exception just to make you happy, 'cause then they would have to unban everyone

Not gonna happen
